content.detailedDescription:
Original, unedited video: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

the day after christmas i got in a huge fight with my mom and took off in 27 degree weather, riding like a maniac on my street bike. i went to my friends house and he wasnt there, so instead i went for another ride. 

i got a crazy idea to go to the reservoir and check out the stars that were so bright. when i pulled into the lot, i realized there was a brown (trail) sign there and decided to go offroading with my street bike because i was so mad that i didnt care! i ended up deep in the woods at a deck that overlooks the reservoir! orions belt was so bright that i thought it would come out on camera... 

while looking at it, i was thinking about my poor little brother whos fighting cancer. then i saw what i thought was an airplane coming towards me, but it was getting brighter and brighter... it disappeared then reappeared, but it was moving side to side also! thats when i got down on my knees and mounted my elbows onto the railing to support my helmet and get the camera very steady. the footage shows something amazing!

it is so much more interesting to watch on my computer frame-by-frame. for youtube, i edited it to make sense of the sighting for a general audience. ufologists believe it without a doubt, but to show that its not fake in any way, i did a lot of work to give more perspective...

i composited a still image from that exact point during day time and left it 10% transparent in the background so you can understand movement better without taking away from the view i saw. i also added 20% contrast to make the objects a tiny bit more clear/bright in the all black background (to show it how i saw it). at the time, i didnt realize that doing this also hides the hundreds of surrounding orbs that are also blinking. its not bad, though, because what i saw clearest was that one airplane-looking amber light that came towards me. also, i didnt visually see them appear in front of me when i yelled to them; i only saw blinks in the distance and could feel their presence!

ive watched many ufo videos on youtube. many are real. the debunkers like to use effects to add perspective to whats going on. i experimented with a different effect called "echo," which makes a trail of the same object. if youre interested in my video analysis, please watch-  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]  

the first thing i did to report this sighting was writing the editor of mufon: clifford clift, who told me my sighting "could not be analyzed" because it is not "original." for this report, i went back to the video and deleted all slowmos and perspective attempts. i also removed the 10% contrast adjustment, which reveals hundreds of surrounding orbs. they are tough to see, but if you look at your screen from an angle, they will be easily distinguished. now this video should absolutely able to be analyzed by the ufo professionals. nothing done to it other than cuts to save time and sound decibel lowering to save your ears!

my last email to clifford explained why i think this video is so important and how i want people to see it on a huge scale, but he ignored me. i think its important for people to see the difference between ufos as objects and ufos as entities/spiritual beings. 

i think this video proves their extra-dimensional existence and that they are trying to communicate with us. this event changed my life and the way i think about life as a whole. its made me realize that life exists beyond life and perhaps how we live our lives is reflected by our souls and not our minds. it has taught me how powerful the mind is and that awareness plays a major role in how you perceive the world around you. 

i am not religious, but i must state what i was doing at the time. i was thinking about my little brother, whos fighting cancer. about 3 weeks prior to this event i was also staring at an open sky, thinking of him when a big bright green and red light fell from the sky at mach speed...But i didnt get that on camera and that was very far away.

this experience opened my mind further than its already been. during the experience, i felt the understanding that life is about how you deal with it; not how you live it. negative thoughts only create negative emotions. stay positive with a clear mind and you can overcome anything. that is the mindset i have now. i no longer hope, but i believe in positivity for every circumstance. i will no longer live in fear. i know my brother will be fine. i will try not to think, "what if?" about something beyond my control.

again, please watch the youtube analysis and leave a comment/opinion. i am eager to see what others think as this is my first time actually filming something i saw in the sky! [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: With gopro helmet cam mounted to my helmet, i steadily filmed intelligent orbs that communicated with me over the water while i was on a deck at night.. amazing footage!

content.detailedDescription: Out for a duck hunt on padilla bay, we set up on a small island on the sw end of padilla bay and were waiting for lst which was at 7:25am. at around 6:45-7:00am, we noticed a large orange/red orb above the tree line of samish island. at first i thought the orb was an airplane light but it never moved. next thought was a helicopter but again the orb did not move. aircraft are very audible over the water. no aircraft sounds were heard. i grabbed my binoculars for a closer look but was unable to determine the light source. it appeared to be significantly larger than an aircraft light.  the orb hovered for at least 5-8 minutes and was there a few minutes before i paid detailed attention to it. the orb/object began to slowly descend. as the orb began to descend we noticed a boat move north through the swinomish channel and then turn directly across padilla bay towards the orb. the boat was blacked out and extremely quiet. what made us notice the boat was its bow crashing through the water. there was no noticeable engine noise coming from the boat. the orb descended below the tree line and was no longer visible. the treeline i describe is samish island between padilla bay and samish bay. i estimate the tree line to be 5 miles from our location that we viewed the orb.
content.summary: Orange/red round light hovering above treeline then decended below treeline

content.detailedDescription:
Very large white light blinked on , then shot out of view at an unbelievable speed

it was twilight (am) and i had just left the local 24hr supermarket and even though it was over very quickly , it was also observed by staff outside having a cigarette.

not the first time ive seen something within that half mile area .
content.summary: Very large white light blinked on , then shot out of view at an unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription:
8pm moore, oklahoma.
went outside to smoke. saw an orange light moving from the sw to the ne, moving towards me. it was moving about 100mph and its elevation was about 500 to 1500 ft.
as it passed over it made no sound and it was orange and slightly pulsating and glowing.
content.summary: Pulsating orange oval light traveling sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from a friends house. i have a bedroom on the basement floor of my house and my bedroom window faces the road, but the road runs parallel to our house so i know what i saw wasn't car lights. i had just gotten into bed and was laying there for 5 minutes. then, a blue light started shining in from outside my window, my blinds were down. i could hear a low key buzzing noise. it couldn't have been a car because car lights can't shine in my window. i then heard movement on the ground outside my window and saw a shadow crossing the blue light shining into my room. i was very frightened. it lasted 1 minute and then it suddenly left. i peaked out the window and saw very strange looking prints in the fresh snow we had just received earlier that night. they didn't appear human in the slightest, but i am certain they were no animal. this was my unexplained encounter.
content.summary: Blue light outside my window with blinds down. saw a humanoid shadow.

content.detailedDescription: It dimmed and got brighter, it looked like it was as high as a plane but it just hovered there. i went inside after looking at it for ten minutes (lol) and ten minutes later, it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was buying some fast food with my wife, while we were waiting i was looking up trying to figure out the name of a star. i have a software installed on my phone that tells me the name of name of any celestial object only by pointing at it, which i did and i couldnt find the name.  to my surprise, this star started to move towards another star, it moved for around 10 to 15 seconds and then stopped when it was pretty "close" to the second star, hovered there for 5 seconds and then vanished.  my wife and i were pointing to the sky and we were excited to see something like this, but to my surprise people around us didnt even looked at the sky.

i kept looking to the sky and a minute of two we saw two more stars one going east west and the second west east direction.  the crossed when they were just below orions belt from my point of view and kept flying until they dissapeared in the horizon.  i called a friend of mine and he was able to see one of the stars moving.   a minute later i saw a plane and i could compare it to what i saw and the lights were totally different, and i dont know how to say this in english but the plane took around 3 minutes to move a very small portion of the sky and these lights covered from side to side in about a minute.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering light the size of a star that moved for 15 secs then hover again  for a couple of secs vanished

content.detailedDescription: Saw the other arlington, tx report and around the same time on the same day i also saw a stationary, glowing object in the sky.  told husband that i thought it was a ufo - have never seen anything like that - still yet high in the sky.  there were no clouds in the sky and i thought it might be a tiny bit of cloud at first until i looked closer and saw it to be still and a strange color.  it appeared to be coppery glow like to me.  he didn't even look as he was driving and didn't believe me anyway.  it unnerved me and i thought about it tonight and checked mufon to see if anyone else saw the same thing as me.  pleased to see that i wasn't the only one to see it.
content.summary: Odd, still form in sky - agree with other arlington witness

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Three glowing objects fly with unusual motion above budapest liszt ferenc international airport. the video was made from p���cel, on 07. 31. 2011. 08:45 pm. one of the objects descends then again rises.

landing aircrafts are visible on the video, but they look different. they move steadily and their navigational lights are flashing.
content.summary: Ufos over budapest liszt ferenc international airport

content.detailedDescription: I came outside for a smoke break and noticed a light hovering in the same spot in the distance.(about plane height) after about 5 minutes the object hadnt moved at all and then it almost looked like it turned itself off or dimmed itself for about a second and disappeared. ive experienced a few sightings in my life but the fact this was in such a largely populated area surprises me that nobody else had seen or reported this incident.
content.summary: Light hovered in the same spot then just shut off

content.detailedDescription:
On january 26 2012 my friend and i drove from our home in arlington to the outlet mall in allen texas. i don't remember exactly what time we arrived. we get out of the car and begin walking passed the stores (its an outlet mall so therefore we're walking outdoors). it's a fairly clear night sky with a few stars (around 5 to 7) in sight, after just 30 seconds to a minute of walking, at approximately 6:20 pm (it could have been 15 minutes earlier or later, i don't remember the exact time) i see what looks just like a small white star, appearing no different from the others in the sky, descend rapidly (from about 70 degrees to 30 degrees in sight). it did not "fall",
it shot down extremely fast, perfectly vertically. at about 30 degrees it vanished, just disappeared out of thin air. no flash. the whole experience lasted a second or less. my friend was not looking in the sky and didn't notice. my first reaction was to tell her. i was in shock and disbelief at what i had just witnessed, it was unlike anything i had seen before or thought possible. it seemed unreal.
content.summary: Shiny white object like other stars in sky  rapidly descended vertically for ~1sec then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from cookeville near mile marker 226 heading towards nashville. the day was sunny and the sky was clear with some clouds. i noticed something in the sky off to my left and it was just hovering there. i pointed it out to my wife as then a tree briefly obscured my vision. i figured if it was an airplane, the object would still be there. as we passed the tree the object was gone. i looked around to see where it was, and it was gone. nowhere to be found. it just disappeared. the object was disc shaped with a dome on top. its color was a glowing white color. my wife did not witness it because it was gone before i could point it out again.
content.summary: Disc like object

content.detailedDescription:
Owing to a hot night i woke early (just before 5am) and went outside to get some cool air. while there i looked at stars and noticed what appeared to be a satellite travelling from ssw to nne, passing through a band of high level cloud to the north and reappearing on the other side of it, lower towards the horizon. (there were patches of mid and high level cloud - less than 1/10 cover.) 

a few minutes after that, i noticed a flashing red light to the wsw, moving ese. my initial thought was that it was a high altitude jet, but: 
(a) the lights were flashing irregularly, and a couple of times increased to be around one-quarter the size of a full moon; 
(b) the object appeared to slow down or pause for several minutes (judged against the background stars), and then resume speed; 
(c) the object changed direction (towards se motion); and 
(d) i don't know any flight paths in that direction (we are ~20km from melbourne's airport, so are accustomed to low level air traffic). 

after a few minutes the light was no longer visible, in approximately south direction, or slightly west of south.
content.summary: High altitude flashing light varying in speed and direction of travel

content.detailedDescription:
Outside my back yard around 7:35 pm, videoing the moon facing the west over the monterey bay i was setting up my trypod with the video camera and turned it on. i notice something in the view finder going arcoss the moon. this was fantastic just by luck " again"; i looked up at the moon and wasnt able to see anything just throught the video camera that was set on night set..I did notice other airplains to the far north east of the area. i tried to follow the ufo and tried to zoom in but mistakenly turned the zoom back to normal and lost the ufo from the shot. all of this took about 15 sec. after about an hour i went back into the house to review the video. the video shows the ufo comming up from the south and going north it was bright white in color it moved very fast then changed direction going upward for a short time then it changed direction again by this time i was trying to zoom in and as the video camera was moving around i lost the ufo.  the video looks pretty good....Over the past years i been able to video other ufos similar to this so far this makes the 5th one.
mufon has some of my videos & photos, but cannot release them to the public yet.
im completing my book to show to the public all of my photos and videos of ufos for the past 45 years...Sorry ive been holding back.....
content.summary: Another video shot of a ufo going arcoss the western sky around 7:35pm. over the monterey bay area.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on a trail with other people around. i notice a red flaming light hovering. i thought maybe it was a helicopter but it made no noise. this was the second time i've seen it. it started moving left to right and up and down. people around me started seeing it as well. then it quickly moved away to the left and moving upward. it moved very fast and then disappeared. just yesterday it reappeared again. doing the samething but i was driving. people around me stopped and started to look at this star looking thing. it had the same look and shape as before. no clouds in the area which made it very clear. it then started moving and then disappeared again. many witness saw it. it was cool when you see it u just know it wasn't a helicopter or airplane. it was something unknown for me.
content.summary: I was walking then notice a red flaming ball hovering. it starts to move right to left and then hovered more. no noise then takes off quickly  and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving along on spid heading downtown at 6 30 pm for a concert. as i was looking to the left while we were passing weber i noticed one of the lights along the highway looked a little strange. so i kept watching and saw red-orange circular object hovering then it moved along the path with the highway heading the opposite direction. it looked like it was trying to blend in with the colors of the lights on the highway but duller and not emitting light and was about the size of a large frisbee. it was traveling slowly and stayed at the same height as it moved which was about 10- 20 ft above treeline and less than 60ft from the highway.
content.summary: I saw an orange circular object hovering along spid and weber as we were driving.

content.detailedDescription: Two bright objects hovering in the sky, one of them disappeared, and the other floated longer.
content.summary: Two bright objects hovering in the sky, one of them disappeared, and the other floated longer. very bright, higher than helicopter, also disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Friday afternoon while working outside i noticed many chem trails and started paying attention to the sky. between noon and one i was watching a jet moving north to south and could tell it was much higher than the commercial aircraft that was also in the sky, so i figured it must have been putting off a chem trail above thirty thousand feet. as i was watching this i noticed what i thought looked like a balloon, yellowish gold in color and perfectly round,running parallel to the chem trail. it was moving south to north. i watched it for several minutes, sure that it was just an errant balloon until it passed behind the chem trails twice, meaning that it had to be way above the altitude of the the jets laying the trails. it also did not occur to me until later that it traveled in a straight line unlike a balloon being pushed about by the winds.
content.summary: Looking at all the chem trails yesterday afternoon and noticed this above them

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in mountaire park in antioch when i saw what i thought was a helicopter. i didn't take notice to it at first. then i said to my friend i think thats a ufo.  then  we watched it then it started goin in a path then stopping very gentlyfor a few seconds then going even faster and stopping gently then changing directiong.  the lights on it were pulsating almost like a wave.  the lights were long looking and red. we followed the thing pretty far then it just disapeared.  it was hands down the craziest thing i have ever seen in my entire life.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw something in the sky i have no clue what it was it didn't act like a helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to wait for my son's bus from school.
notice many birds flying crazy and disorientated of there flight.
this allowed me to look up to see about 50 plus orbs in the sky.
i then took a few picture hoping to capture what i was seeing.
i did capture them i saw them enhance after downloading to computer and magnified.
picture number 1 is the best out of four pictures taken.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed birds flying very disorientated which allowed me to take pictures of many orbs flying

content.detailedDescription: Stationary light. then decened behind the view of the mountain. approx. 8 miles away. pulsating at times. orange in one photo. one year and 21 day from last sighting.
content.summary: Stationary light. then decened behind the view of the mountain. approx. 8 miles away.

content.detailedDescription: I seen this ufo for 3 days know going in the same way every time trying to get a better video of it but i dont have a night vision camera.I was standing in my back yard looking for a ufo and then for some resone i turned around then there it was tryed to get it on video but i didnt get it it was going to fast the second night it came at the same time between 7-9pm i got it on the second night and the third night night which is 1-28-2012 i seen it again same direction same speed but i couldnt get to the camera in time.I hope you can clarify the video better.
content.summary: Went from west to east the ufo was moving pretty fast i have a video of it.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:16 pm on friday, january 27, 2012, a friend called me from jackson, tennessee and described some strange lights that he and his son were watching in the sky. i live about 8 miles from him in medina, tennessee. after about 6 or 8 minutes i was able to find the lights he was describing. they were oval shaped lights (about 6) that were moving in a general counter-clockwise circular pattern and were in the southwest sky close to the moons position. there were some clouds in the area of the moon that obscured it. the lights were reflecting off of these clouds. i soon identified these as lights from a spotlight since i had seen similar lights rotating in this pattern several years ago (i even drove and found the spotlight in the parking lot of a local club in jackson).

i had called my son, daughter, and wife out to the back porch to check out the lights. since i could identify them, i didnt grab a camera. as we were watching these lights a bright light appeared out of nowhere at approximately 8:30 pm. the light was due south of our location at about 25 to 30 degrees above the horizon. it was very bright, mostly steady, solid white but with a redish/orange pulsating glow around it. it was traveling directly towards our position. at first i thought it might be a helicopter with its search light on coming straight at us. however, as it got closer, the light never changed even after it got directly above us. also, it became apparent that it was actually very high (several miles) and was moving at an extremely high rate of speed. there was also no sound. it moved in a steady straight path eventualy getting to 90 degrees directly above us. at first i thought that this object was the international space station since i have seen it pass over many times over the years. the white part of the light was solid and steady, not blinking, but the outer edges were glowing red and orange with a pulsating action. the size of the object was also very similar to the size of the station and had a very similar brightness. however, i have never seen edges like this on the station. after i came in, i checked the position of the station and it was over australia.

the object continued over our heads and as it got to about 100 or 115 degrees it became redish/orange only, began to get smaller and smaller until it just blinked out. my son got my wifes iphone and did manage to take video of the object after it passed 90 degrees and until it blinked out. we viewed the object for about 60 seconds from the time we first saw it until it vanished.

i am confused about this because of the color and characteristics of the object. my instinct was that it was a satellite, however, i know of nothing that bright other than the space station and as i said, it was not in our area. also, the color was very strange with the pulsating red and orange edges compared to what i have seen of satellites in the past. i have attached the video also.
content.summary: Bright pulsating white/orange/red object travels directly overhead then fades and blinks out.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was done not by me but a friend of mine. he is not computer savvy and gave permission to me to report to anyone i found on the net that might help to explain it. 
while camping in the desert he woke up and needed to relive himself.  outside he was admiring the stars when a very bright star moved. it caught his eye. he call for his wife and asked her to bring her new droid phone. they both watched this star move and stop several times. they took a picture of it with their droid phone. they said they then looked at the picture on the phone and enlarged it and saw what i am sending to you now. when they looked back up the light was gone.
content.summary: Bright moving star

content.detailedDescription:
1/27/12 7:15pm went out to put my oven grates in the grass  i spooked a black ufo in the air 5ft in the air 20ft in my face ran around the corner of my house for better look and it was gone real fast,went back in the house to watch tv and it came back at 7:30pm this time my son saw it at the front door 3ft away and 3ft off the ground moving in a controled speed about 5mph all black square 3ft in size im on red alert now just so close this thing is checking me out ufo all the way
to bad it did not stay for a bit i have a 1080p go pro camera
content.summary: Black 3ft square ufo going around my house close up front door and back

content.detailedDescription:
This is a follow-up to the september 15, 2010 triangle-shaped ufo sighting on route 87/97 near pandora, texas.  this is my attempt to reverse-engineer the sighting with a simple technical report and drawing on how this ship���s propulsion system operated. actual materials and constructions techniques are not known (yet). 
1) the triangle-shaped ship has three magnetic spears located at each end of the triangle. each of the magnetic spears are built with the magnetic polarity (- to +, or, + to -, a.K.A. north and south magnetic poles) field moving directly from the center of the spear outward toward the surface of the spear.
2) the triangle-shaped ship���s haul is built with exactly curved pockets at each end of the triangle to commandant the three spears - with - a means to move the spear closer or farther away from the ship���s haul without causing interference with magnetic field flow.  
3) the ship���s haul pockets are built to the same polarity as the faces of each spear and - when the two are squeezed together ��� they make a repelling magnetic force field (like in electromagnetic theory: like poles, - to -, or, + to +; a.K.A. n and n poles or s and s poles, will repel each other if forced together). 
4) each individual spears' distances from the ship���s haul is independently adjusted to increases or decreases the size of the repelling magnetic force field each spear produces (the distance between the two looked to be very narrow for it to work).  the ship rides ���on-top��� of the earth���s longitude magnetic field with speed and direction determined by the amount of magnetic force produced by the three repelling magnetic force field of the three spears��� and the ship���s haul interactions with each other. they use three magnetic fields poles to counteract our two magnetic field poles.   
5) since the triangle ship is using "free" flowing magnetic fields, no "mechanical��� motor is needed, thus the absent of sound as noted during most ufo sightings. 
6) please see enclosed drawing.
content.summary: Reverse-engineering of september 15, 2010 pandora, texas ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out to get my dog from the backyard . i noticed a bright light out of the corner of my eye.Looked up and seen a large fireball like object.The object was moving about the speed of an airplaine.The object was radiating fire from all sides this was a round object.There was no tail or fire trail i observed the object for 10-15 seconds. at this point the fireball began to wobble slightly about 4-5 times just enough to make it look kinda blury.Right after it wobbled a few times it change directions slightly maybe 10-15 degree's at an upward direction. it apeared to increase in speed and looked smaller as it vanished out of sight in just a few seconds.My sister and her daughter pullep in there car as i was watching the object.They both seen it right after it wobbled and shot of out of sight. i am not sure what i have just seen do not think it was a metior or space junk. there was no tail and this thing took off very fast and looked to gain altitude and was out of sight in nothing flat.Feeling confused at this point hope someone else saw this thing whatever it was.
content.summary: large fireball no tail moving fast wobbled a little and shot off gone in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: In bed, sound asleep, i was awakened by a strange low buzzing and the sensation of a line of electrical-type tingling moving across my leg, as if i were in an mri. no lights. the cat on my bed seemed unaware and he started purring which oddly imitated the sound i was hearing. the vibrations i felt contributed to the sound- i laid still and tried to focus on whether it was a slight earthquake temblor but nothing more occurred, and suddenly it was eerily quiet. i was too groggy to think quickly enough to jump up and run outside. i regret not having done so. i have seen two orange disc/orbs in my neighborhood in the past few months that have seemingly glided low over the rooftops. i strongly feel that this was another one and it was hovering over my house. it was not a fearful experience.
content.summary: I think my house or neighborhood was being scanned.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened on january 25, 2012 and i was looking out my bedroom window at approx 5:30 pm.
  
there was a reflection of a very bright star which caught my attention as i love the night sky.  the reflection of the star was seen off of a window of a neighbors house but the dark round object appeared 3 feet beyond the neighbors house so it could not have been the star that caused the light.

when i first saw it i thought it was aviation (helicopters) doing a search but there was no sound or other light emitting from the object.

the object was very dark in color, darker than the night sky which was a dark blue and round like a circle.  there was no shininess to it.  the motion of the object was traveling very quickly in a straight path.  then a gradually brightening white light started emitting from the object.  the white light got so bright i could see my driveway light up with all the light and then just as quickly shut off and there was no more light or object.

during this, my reaction was excitement that i had finally seen a ufo!! i was observing the objects and its actions with complete attention.
content.summary: Dark round object

content.detailedDescription:
In english (not a very good one):
it was a sunny morning, around 9:00 am, there were no clouds and the temperature was about 10���c. i was with my family in my apartment, located in the colony "letran valle" in mexico city. we were just to breakfast, when looking out the window, i saw far away a series of some objects that at first seemed like metallic balloons.
after looking at them for some time, we note that they were not actually balloons like.
they were at a distance of about 5 to 6 kilometers south-west direction, at the height of the horizon (approximate) . the group of objects climbed slowly, one followed by another one (we count around 75 of them) to reach a high altitude (about 50 degrees from my place, maybe around 40 to 60 km to the ground), and slowly they began to move northward.
hard to tell if they emitted some kind of light or just reflected sunlight (which was very intense) because they looked very small from our perspective, and it was, sometimes, easy to lose them in the blue sky.
we took some pictures with cell phones, but it not work at all (they were too high), so i took my old canon rebel xt semi-pro digital camera (8 mega-pixels) and i took around 10 pictures without knowing if it really will work (because i can't see anything from the camera vision), it was very difficult to focus, given its small size and high altitude.
it took about 10 to 15 minutes to the group of objects to cross the sky, until they passed over our building (four floors), and we were not able to see them anymore.
by capturing the photographs in the computer,i happily discover the objects on the pictures with some help of the digital zoom, but sadly i did not take any clear object to work like reference to the objects...

pd: also, my lens was very dirty :p

--------------------------------------

en espa���ol:
era una ma���ana soleada, al rededor de las 9:00 a.M., no hab���a nubes y la temperatura era de unos 10���c. estaba con mi familia en mi departamento, ubicado en la colonia letran valle, en la ciudad de m���xico. estabamos por desayunar, cuando al mirar por la ventana (frente a la mesa), observ���, bast���nte lejos, una serie de objetos que en un primer momento parec���an globos metalicos.
luego de mirarlos con mayor atenci���n, nosotros notamos que no aprec���an ser globos.
se encontraban a una distancia de unos 5 a 6 km, en direcci���n al suroeste, a la altura del horizonte. ascendieron lentamente, unos seguidos de otros (contamos al rededor de 75 objetos) hasta alcanzar una gran altitud (a unos 50��� desde mi perpectiva), y lentamente comenzaron a avanzar hacia el norte.
es dificil saber si emit���an una luz propia o reflejaban la luz del sol (que era muy intensa) y se ve���an basnate peque���os desde nuestra perscetiva; tanto que en ocasiones era f���cil perderlos de vista.
